row.scheme: ;;;OpenFirstTimeBar (let ((tag "Volta1")) (d-Directive-standalone tag) (d-DirectivePut-standalone-minpixels tag 50) (d-DirectivePut-standalone-postfix tag " \\set Score.repeatCommands = #'((volta \"1\")) ") (d-DirectivePut-standalone-gx tag 37) (d-DirectivePut-standalone-gy tag -34) (d-DirectivePut-standalone-graphic tag "FirstTimeBar") (d-MoveCursorRight) (d-RefreshDisplay) (d-SetSaved #f))
row._tooltip: (Print) start a first time bar, must be followed by EndVolta.
